LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.alcohol_withdra: Feeling shaky. Everything pisses me off. I keep thinking of drinking.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.mild_hangover.label: mild hangover
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.serious_hangover.label: serious hangover
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.serious_hangover.descrip: My head hurts from all that liquor.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.pounding_hangover.label: pounding hangover
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.pounding_hangover.descri: It feels like a gaggle of geese are pecking at my skull.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.alcohol_warmth.label: alcohol warmth
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.alcohol_warmth.descrip: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.quite_inebriated.label: quite inebriated
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.quite_inebriated.descr: I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.drunk.label: drunk
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.drunk.description: I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.hammered.label: hammered
